definition: to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: Part four , Qianjiang district savings and intensive land use indicators of control.
sentences.chinese: 建立黔江區城鎮土地集約利用評價指標體系。

sentences.english: The profile distribution of different fractions of organic carbon were not altered by intensive practice.
sentences.chinese: 毛竹集約經營未改變各類有機碳的剖面變化特徵。

sentences.english: Part three , Qianjiang district of the intensive use of land for construction purposes of the present situation.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，黔江區集約用地指標控制分析。

sentences.english: In the basis of intensive management, the company continued to expand to new areas.
sentences.chinese: 在集約化經營的基礎上，公司不斷向新的領域擴展。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, intensive activity space provides opportunity for neighborhood communication.
sentences.chinese: 集約式的活動空間設計，提供良好的鄰里交流空間。

sentences.english: A more fundamental problem has to do with the nature of intensive growth itself.
sentences.chinese: 一個更根本的問題涉及集約型發展本身。

sentences.english: Ningbo City "four measures" Let's improve the intensive utilization of land.
sentences.chinese: 寧波市“四項措施”讓我們提高土地集約利用。

sentences.english: Fourth, work for all-round development of the people and promote intensive economic development.
sentences.chinese: 四是全面提高人的素質，推動中國經濟集約發展。

sentences.english: Advances in technology favour the intensification of poultry production in developing countries.
sentences.chinese: 技術進步有利於發展中國家家禽養殖的集約化發展。

sentences.english: In transportation convenience Hsinhsiang city Muye industry intensive development area.
sentences.chinese: 交通便利的新鄉市牧野工業集約發展區內。

sentences.english: Similar to many LDC, Chinese agricultural modernization is Intensive-Sustainable agriculture.
sentences.chinese: 集約持續農業是中國與發展中國家較好的選擇。

sentences.english: In other words, it is in the transitional period from extensiveness to intensiveness.
sentences.chinese: 或者說，是處於粗放型向集約型轉變的過渡時期。

sentences.english: To bring about a change from extensive to intensive management of the economy as a whole.
sentences.chinese: 促進整個經濟由粗放經營向集約經營轉變。

sentences.english: To build intensive urban and conservation-oriented society is the only way for urbanization in China.
sentences.chinese: 集約型城市和節約型社會是中國城鎮化的必由之路。

sentences.english: Part seven , Promotes the Qianjiang district land to save with the intensive use measure and the suggestion.
sentences.chinese: 第七部分，促進黔江區土地集約利用的措施和建議。

sentences.english: The extensive cultivation should be transformed into intensive farming.
sentences.chinese: 應該變粗放耕作爲集約經營。

definition: normalized (statistics)/to normalize (relations etc)/to become the norm
see 推進器|推进器[tui1 jin4 qi4]
modernization of agriculture, one of Deng Xiaoping's Four Modernizations
